      • resetOdometry

        public void resetOdometry​(edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d pose)
        Force the pose estimator and all sensors to a particular pose. This is useful for indicating to the software when you have manually moved your robot in a particular position on the field (EX: when you place it on the field at the start of the match).
        Parameters:
        pose - Pose2d to reset to

      • getCtrlsPoseEstimate
